alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 6:52PM EDT until July 02 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Monroe County in south central Indiana... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 652 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Bloomington, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bloomington, Whitehall and Smithville around 705 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Indiana University, Monroe Reservoir, Unionville and Woodville Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
